alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 2:23PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Collier, northern Miami-Dade and southern Broward Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 223 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Intersection Alligator Alley And Miami Canal to 10 miles southeast of Miccosukee Service Plaza to 7 miles east of Big Cypress National Preserve. Movement was west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Intersection Alligator Alley And Miami Canal, Mile Marker 30 On Alligator Alley and Big Cypress National Preserve. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County
